title: Khua a var dawn ta a Lalpa chi tuh turin tho ru
lyrics:
Khua a var dawn ta a, Lalpa chi tuh turin tho r'u,
Ni tlak thlengin Lalpa tan thawk zel rawh u;
Mi rilru ngui takte pawh chu kai tho zel ang che u,
Dawhthei takin Lalpa tan thawk ang che u.

Chi hlu chu tuh rawh u, chi hlu chu tuh rawh u,
Kil tinte leh ram tinte fang zel ulangin;
Nunna chhang phel ula, Chanchin tha tlangaupui ula,
Lalpa tan thawk rawh u, lawmman a tam ang.

Zing takah tho ula, Lalpa tan thawk tan nghal rawh u,
Khaw thim thlengin chi tha hi tuh zel rawh u;
Ringhlel lovin chi tha hi in tuh zel tur a ni e,
Engkim kalsan vekin Pathian chauh ringin.

Chi tha hi thahnemngai tak leh rinawmin tuh rawh u,
In chi tuh chu in at leh vek ngei dawn e;
Chi tha chu tuh ula, tha leh rilru pawh chau lovin,
Pahtian henah ma
lsawmsakna dil zelin.
